hero.title: Transform Your Space with Pro Touch
hero.subtitle: Professional Painting & Drywall
hero.description: Over 20 years of experience delivering high-quality painting and drywall services to residential, commercial, and HOA clients. Your satisfaction is our priority.

services.title: Our Professional Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for residential, commercial, and HOA painting and drywall needs

drywall.title: Drywall Installation & Repair
drywall.description: Expert installation of new drywall and seamless repairs for existing walls. We handle everything from small patches to complete room installations.

popcorn.title: Popcorn Ceiling Removal
popcorn.description: Transform outdated popcorn ceilings into smooth, modern surfaces. Safe removal with minimal mess and disruption to your home.

cabinet.title: Cabinet Refinishing
cabinet.description: Give your kitchen or bathroom a stunning makeover with professional cabinet refinishing. Save thousands compared to replacement.

power.title: Power Washing
power.description: Restore your property's exterior surfaces to like-new condition with professional power washing services.

epoxy.title: Epoxy Garage Floors
epoxy.description: Transform your garage with durable, beautiful epoxy flooring. Choose from a variety of decorative chip styles and gradient patterns for a custom look.

texture.title: Texture Application
texture.description: Add character and dimension to your walls and ceilings with professional texture application services.

painting.title: Interior & Exterior Painting
painting.description: Transform any space with our premium painting services. Specializing in residential homes, commercial properties, and HOA communities, we use top-quality paints and meticulous techniques for flawless results.

gallery.title: Our Work Gallery
gallery.subtitle: See the quality and craftsmanship in our recent projects

about.title: Why Choose Pro Touch?
about.description: With over 25 years of experience in the painting and drywall industry, Pro Touch Painting & Drywall has built a reputation for excellence, reliability, and exceptional craftsmanship. As a trusted HOA contractor, we take pride in transforming residential, commercial, and community spaces while exceeding our clients' expectations on every project.

onTime.title: On-Time Completion
onTime.description: We respect your time and complete projects on schedule

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: 100% satisfaction guarantee on all our work

communication.title: Clear Communication
communication.description: Transparent pricing and regular project updates

licensed.title: Licensed & Insured
licensed.description: Fully licensed, bonded, and insured for your protection

reviews.text: Our HOA chose Pro Touch Painting, and we are extremely happy they did. Our house was finished today, and we are so impressed! Over 20 units in our HOA are finished at this point, and they are all looking great. The neighbors we have talked to are very pleased. Jorge and the crew are true pros - very efficient. Prep work was thorough. Communication was excellent, and we smiled whenever one of the crew would sing a tune. Â¡Su experiencia se nota y se merecen cada una de las cinco estrellas!
reviews.author: James B R

reviews.text: AMAZING TEAM!!! It's a family ran business and I've used them for YEARS! They do all my new homes and I would not use another painter. Jorge is great! Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value - they excel at everything!
reviews.author: Jorge Ruiz
